definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地參加了上述活動。

sentences.english: In the evening, Speaker Mami held a welcome banquet for Chairman Wu.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，馬米議長爲吳邦國委員長舉行了歡迎宴會。

sentences.english: They returned the kindness to Chairman Li and the National People's Congress of China.
sentences.chinese: 他們也向李委員長和中國全國人大轉達了問候。

sentences.english: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th NPC will deliver a speech.
sentences.chinese: 第十一屆全國人大常委會委員長講話。

sentences.english: Chairman Wu's other companions arrived in the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的其他陪同人員同機抵達。

sentences.english: Alencar said he was delighted to welcome Wu in Brazilia.
sentences.chinese: 阿倫卡爾表示非常高興在巴西利亞歡迎吳邦國委員長。

sentences.english: Rebelo first extended warm welcome for Wu's arrival.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝洛首先對吳邦國委員長的來訪表示熱烈歡迎。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the NPC Re Di was present at the talks.
sentences.chinese: 中國全國人大常委會副委員長熱地等參加了會談。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee accompanied Wu during the visit and meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地陪同參觀和接見。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地參加了會見。

sentences.english: Wu's speech ended amid a long period of warm applauses.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的演講在長時間熱烈的掌聲中結束。

sentences.english: Other accompanying officials arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國委員長的其他陪同人員同機抵達。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee and other officials attended the talks.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地等參加了會談。

sentences.english: Chairman Li extended a warm welcome to Bouteflika.
sentences.chinese: 李鵬委員長對總統訪華表示熱烈歡迎。

sentences.english: Lupu first extended warm welcome for Chairman Wu's visit.
sentences.chinese: 盧普首先對吳邦國委員長的來訪表示熱烈歡迎。

sentences.english: Sirajuddin said that he was happy to meet with Chairman Wu Bangguo.
sentences.chinese: 西拉傑丁表示很高興與吳委員長會面。

definition: the original name of 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1], Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3]
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Zhang Zhizhong (1890-1969), National Revolutionary Army general
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
to receive sb/to grant an interview
